name: 戴维·怀特黑德
name_full: 戴维·怀特黑德 David Whitehead

last_movies.title: 福尔摩斯对战弗兰肯斯坦

introduction: David Whitehead is a prolific English writer. Born in London in 1958, he sold his first book in 1984. Since then David has written more than seventy books; westerns, thrillers, romances, horrors and even Sherlock Holmes pastiches. More recently he has acted as associate producer on several projects -- Day of the Gun (2013), Milgram and the Fastwalkers (2012) and the forthcoming Sherlock Holmes vs. Frankenstein. In addition, he has also written novels to tie-in with these projects.
